title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: When using the 'All types' dialog, obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') are being displayed.
EB: The 'All types' dialog should only show non-obfuscated classes and exclude the obfuscated classes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the 'All types' dialog
2. Observe that obfuscated classes are being displayed

Possible solutions:
a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter
b) Filter out the obfuscated classes completely
